attributes.action: provide Defra registered owners of road vehicles a reduced road tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It seems very unfair to increase road tax and apply this levy on vehicle owners where the vehicle is used as part of essential business e.g. farming and small holders.  An easy way to distinguish between essential use and the chelsea tractor set would be to check against the Defra Register of farmers and small holders.  A simple cross reference against holders and geographic location would also confirm types of ownership.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
